title: Silca 3D prints ultralight titanium shop tools, hammers away the weight
content:
If you routinely pack, carry, and unpack your tools for pit work or team bike maintenance at the races, these new Silca Titanium Shop Tools should be a sight for sore…arms. Using their new 3D printing machines to fabricate lightweight titanium bike tools, they’re showing that the ti out-front cycling computer mounts weren’t the only […]

The post Silca 3D prints ultralight titanium shop tools, hammers away the weight appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
